results.title: Randomized controlled trial in alcohol relapse prevention: role of atenolol, alcohol craving, and treatment adherence.
results.text_hl: We conducted a new study to assess whether the daily use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ by the abstinent alcoholic could maintain a blunted @DISEASE_Pleoconial_Myopathy_with_Salt_Craving @DISEASE_MESH:C564883 @@@craving@@@ for @CHEMICAL_Alcohols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000438 @@@alcohol@@@ and result in a decreased rate of relapse for @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcohol abuse@@@.

citations.NLM: Gottlieb LD, Horwitz RI, Kraus ML, Segal SR, Viscoli CM. Randomized controlled trial in alcohol relapse prevention: role of atenolol, alcohol craving, and treatment adherence. J Subst Abuse Treat. 1994 May-Jun;11(3):253-8. PMID: 8072054
